messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 2/24/2006 3:14:08 PM Eastern Standard Time,
sandralzires@... writes:
> As far as I know, high sugar intake or other unhealthy food = poor
> nutrition. Add germs and you get illness. That's the theory I buy
> into. Any communts?
> Thanks,
> Sandra
>
> ***I buy into that theory COMPLETELY Sandra. Sure is hard to stay away from
> though! It seems like I've read somewhere before that sugar is one of the
> many things that we DON'T need to ingest extra into our bodies, that our body
> makes it's own sugar, that we certainly don't need to supplement it and that
> in doing so, it can only cause all of the things listed in that article you
> just posted. ????
>
>
